name: Zhubis
description: Zhubis is an original dice game.  As in all dice games, players must roll the dice, but this game has its own identity. Players know the number that they need to roll using 2 dice to advance on the board. Players could win by being first to get to space number 6 or by others being eliminated.  On each space (1-6) there are 6 possible combinations that a player could roll to advance and 5 that could set them back.  Many other combinations will leave the player standing still.   In this case, a player may have an opportunity to be safe and wait for their next turn or chance and risk a setback. It’s all in the roll!
